name: Ic Design
tagline: Creating and building successful brands since 1998
description: With a strong brand proposition and design identity you maximise your business opportunities through increased engagement and more staying power. We are an independent creative agency working across both digital and print. Based in Soho, London, the founding MD still leads the business. As we celebrate 20 years of creativity in 2018, we can reassuringly deliver well-honed processes and level of service to rival larger agencies but with the benefit of a true personal touch.
